title: Pre-existing TypeScript error in workbench-client.tsx blocks dashboard build
issue: RecordingSettings type is missing required fields rna_timeout_seconds and max_call_duration_minutes in the initial state definition. This causes the dashboard build to fail with: Type '{ enabled: false; retention_days: number; transcription_enabled: false; ai_summary_enabled: false; ai_summary_prompt_format: null; }' is missing the following properties from type 'RecordingSettings': rna_timeout_seconds, max_call_duration_minutes
suggestion: Add the missing fields to the initial RecordingSettings state: rna_timeout_seconds and max_call_duration_minutes with appropriate default values
